SignatureExampleMod:SPDoll.NAME: SP Doll
SignatureExampleMod:SPDoll.DESCRIPTION: Randomly *Place a *Shanghai *Doll or *Kyoto *Doll in at most !M! random empty slots, respectively.

SignatureExampleMod:DollCremation.NAME: Doll Cremation
SignatureExampleMod:DollCremation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL *Recycle the rightmost *Doll, deal !D! damage.

SignatureExampleMod:DollActivation.NAME: Doll Activation
SignatureExampleMod:DollActivation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, your rightmost *Doll *Acts once.
SignatureExampleMod:DollActivation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, your rightmost !M! *Dolls each *Act once.

SignatureExampleMod:IllusoryMoon.NAME: Illusory Moon
SignatureExampleMod:IllusoryMoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 damage, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

SignatureExampleMod:SurpriseSpring.NAME: Surprise Spring
SignatureExampleMod:SurpriseSpring.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card, and Upgrade it this combat. NL Exhaust.
SignatureExampleMod:SurpriseSpring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card, and Upgrade it this combat. NL Exhaust.

SignatureExampleMod:CollapsingWorlds.NAME: Collapsing Worlds!
SignatureExampleMod:CollapsingWorlds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills the target, gain an extra turn after this one, and then Exhaust.

SignatureExampleMod:PrincessForm.NAME: Princess Form
SignatureExampleMod:PrincessForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a 1-cost card, add its copy with *Phantom to your hand. NL *Phantom cards do not trigger this effect.
SignatureExampleMod:PrincessForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 1-cost card, add its copy with *Phantom to your hand. NL *Phantom cards do not trigger this effect.

SignatureExampleMod:PaintballLob.NAME: Paintball Lob
SignatureExampleMod:PaintballLob.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL *Load this card.

SignatureExampleMod:Retro.NAME: Retro
SignatureExampleMod:Retro.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage and Block of cards with a rarity of Common, Uncommon, or Special by !M!.
SignatureExampleMod:Retro.SIGNATURE_UNLOCK_CONDITION: View the upgraded version of this card. NL (Resets each time you launch the game.)

SignatureExampleMod:EverydayMomentsWithY.NAME: Moments
SignatureExampleMod:EverydayMomentsWithY.DESCRIPTION: *Load a *Miracle+. NL If played from *Magazine, *Load this card; otherwise, Exhaust.
SignatureExampleMod:EverydayMomentsWithY.SIGNATURE_UNLOCK_CONDITION: Everyday moments with you, unfolds into miracles. NL (Hint: Toggle Debug mode of STS Signature Lib in the Mods settings panel)
